-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Automated Mutation Testing for QuickCheck tests
--   
--   This package contains the test adapter for QuickCheck tests to use it
--   with MuCheck
@package MuCheck-QuickCheck
@version 0.3.0.4


-- | Module for using quickcheck properties
module Test.MuCheck.TestAdapter.QuickCheck
type QuickCheckSummary = Result

-- | Summarizable instance of <a>Result</a>
instance Typeable Result
instance Summarizable QuickCheckSummary
